about_the_game:
Lab 03 Yrinth : Salina Archive Map Pack


Salina's maps base files for identification and data capture from all subjects.
25 maps that help subjects on finding their way out of the mazes.

PNG file will be placed in your Lab 03 Yrinth folder in the Steam Directory :
PC\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Lab 03 Yrinth\Lab03YrinthSalinaMapPack

Enjoy!
detailed_description:
Lab 03 Yrinth : Salina Archive Map Pack


Salina's maps base files for identification and data capture from all subjects.
25 maps that help subjects on finding their way out of the mazes.

PNG file will be placed in your Lab 03 Yrinth folder in the Steam Directory :
PC\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Lab 03 Yrinth\Lab03YrinthSalinaMapPack

Enjoy!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions
  • Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or greater
  • Processor: Any 64 processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible All Video card
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
